content: Seeing extremely slow speeds downloading nightlies today. Tried both locally and from a data center in Netherlands. It tops out at ~300kB/s or so.

yeah, 

# curl 'https://static.rust-lang.org/dist/2020-12-14/rust-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz' -o /dev/null
  % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current
                                 Dload  Upload   Total   Spent    Left  Speed
  0  140M    0  710k    0     0   228k      0  0:10:31  0:00:03  0:10:28  228k

$ curl 'https://static.rust-lang.org/dist/2020-12-14/rust-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz' -o /dev/null
  % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current
                                 Dload  Upload   Total   Spent    Left  Speed
100  140M  100  140M    0     0  84.6M      0  0:00:01  0:00:01 --:--:-- 84.6M
@nagisa where is locally for you? I am in southeast US
I'm in Lithuania. Like I said I also tried from a VM in Netherlands.
Seems likely to be an intermittent CloudFront issue that's not really possible for anyone outside amazon to debug :-/
Yeah, I'll just go and eat some lunch while I wait for nix to fetch nightlies ^^
(getting this too, from germany, ~300 kb/s while fetching a new master toolchain)
